languages.text: "Сначала разбомбим позиции врага, а затем будем наступать аккуратно и беречь солдат".
"We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."
languages.original_text: "Сначала разбомбим позиции врага, а затем будем наступать аккуратно и беречь солдат".

traits.locale_text: "We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."
"We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."
"We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."
"We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."
"We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."
"We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."

languages.text: “我们准备先对敌人的阵地进行轰炸，之后谨慎地向前推进。我们必须节省兵力。”
languages.original_text: "We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."

traits.locale_text: “我们准备先对敌人的阵地进行轰炸，之后谨慎地向前推进。我们必须节省兵力。”

languages.text: « Nous allons commencer par bombarder les positions de l'ennemi, après quoi nous progresserons avec prudence. Nous devons préserver nos troupes. »
languages.original_text: "We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons commencer par bombarder les positions de l'ennemi, après quoi nous progresserons avec prudence. Nous devons préserver nos troupes. »

languages.text: 「まずは敵の陣地を砲撃し、それから慎重に前進する。兵力を温存しなければならない」
languages.original_text: "We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."

traits.locale_text: 「まずは敵の陣地を砲撃し、それから慎重に前進する。兵力を温存しなければならない」

languages.text: «Empezaremos bombardeando las posiciones enemigos y luego iremos avanzando con cuidado. La prioridad es que nuestras tropas no sufran bajas».
languages.original_text: "We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."

traits.locale_text: «Empezaremos bombardeando las posiciones enemigos y luego iremos avanzando con cuidado. La prioridad es que nuestras tropas no sufran bajas».

languages.text: "Wir werden damit beginnen, die Positionen des Feindes zu bombardieren, und dann vorsichtig vorrücken. Wir müssen unsere Truppen aufsparen."
languages.original_text: "We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden damit beginnen, die Positionen des Feindes zu bombardieren, und dann vorsichtig vorrücken. Wir müssen unsere Truppen aufsparen."

languages.text: "Düşman konumlarını bombardımana tutarak başlayacağız. Sonrasında da temkinlice ilerleyeceğiz. Birimlerimize sahip çıkmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "We will begin by bombarding the enemy's positions, then advance cautiously. We must conserve our troops."
